text: Menahem Degani (18 August 1927 - 23 November 2018) was an Israeli basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament for the Israel's national team at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Degani was born in Tel Aviv and died in Tel Aviv at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Israeli basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Tel Aviv
title: Menahem Degani
